author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the OPTCG cog! Use `[p]help optcg` to see available commands.
name: OPTCG
short: One Piece Trading Card Game collection system
description: Spawn and collect One Piece TCG cards in your server. Features include random card spawns, collection management, and rarity-based spawn weights.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about users' card collections, including which cards they've claimed and statistics about their collection.
